tfff 0.0.0.9000

Package index

All functions

download_file()
Download a file from a GitHub repository
get_files()
Get a list of files matching a pattern from a GitHub repository
load_obtn_data()
Load data from a GitHub repository
register_fonts()
Function to register fonts of the TFFF
t_col()
Transparency color - from https://www.dataanalytics.org.uk/make-transparent-colors-in-r/
tfff_colors()
Function to extract TFFF colors as hex codes
tfff_draft()
TFFF paged template
tfff_get_basemap()
Function to get an sf object with the TFFF service area (Oregon and Siskiyou County, California)
tfff_offices
Locations of TFFF offices
theme_tfff()
TFFF ggplot2 theme
